creator: tmadillo@idocw.com
text:
I can't use cookie in a test.
(I have an response like : 'you must enable cookie on your browser')
I had the http Cookie Manager, but how he works ?

surrely a stupid question, but I don't find anything in the documentation,
has someone an example ?

thanks,

ThM

creator: ajslater@mediaone.net
text: See bug 5811 too. Cookies not working for proxy server

creator: mstover1@apache.org
text:
cookies are now working for proxy server (latest CVS code only).  Simply adding 
the cookie manager to your threadgroup (nothing more, it needs no configuring) 
should make cookies work during a test run.  I'm going to close this, cause I 
don't think it's a problem.

creator: jsalvata@atg.com
text:
Marking all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8's release date as VERIFIED.
Yes, it's pretty poor QA procedure, but there's bugs here lingering since JMeter
1.6, and we need to clean up a little.
Bulk-closing all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8 release date.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com
